metadata.synopsis: The guard has decided to get rid of the pilgrims, sending them to their death in the shadow lands, their bodies found later in TWN.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Acolyte Belub in Moonrise and tell him the pilgrims are not needed. He will walk over to them and play the AD.

2.speaker: Acolyte Belub
2.text: Right, pilgrims. You'll be scouting the perimeter of the war camp, looking for enemies.
2.context: NodeContext: He's actually sending them to die in the curse, they just don't know it

3.speaker: Pilgrim Iong
3.text: But... the shadows. It's death out there without a guide.
3.context: NodeContext: Masking fear - sounds like he;s being sent to his death

1.speaker: Acolyte Belub
1.text: The shadows won't harm you, so long as you know your place in the Absolute's design.

0.speaker: Pilgrim Iong
0.context: NodeContext: Firm, trying to have faith
